attributes.action: Make dog safety education in schools compulsory
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
dog attacks have risen 50% in a decade. a lot of these attacks were on children. education on dog safety is needed to prevent children become victims of dog attacks. studies by Dr. Stanley Coren show that just 1 hour of dog safety education between years 2 and 3 reduced dog attacks on that age group by 80%. 

if we had compulsory dog safety education we could reduce the number of children mauled by dogs.
